title: [Darcconis' Weaponry]
[Darcconis' General Store]
description: The broad sweep of the oak floor is interrupted by a pile of striped throw pillows.  Halfway to the beam ceiling, a blue watered silk tapestry hangs on one of the varnished ebonwood walls.  A flexible willow woven basket and a vine-carved mahogany table are pushed close together in the back of the shop.
